title: Community Fits
description: Stores user-submitted outfit photos ('fits') with captions and metadata for the Community Fits section.

user_handle.title: User Handle
user_handle.description: Optional user name or handle who submitted the fit.

image_urls.description: JSON stringified array of image URLs uploaded by the user.

caption.title: Caption
caption.description: Short caption or description for the fit.

approved.title: Approved
approved.description: Admin approval status: 1 for approved, 0 for pending or rejected.

like_count.title: Like Count
like_count.description: Number of likes for the post.
